commit.message:
Rollup merge of #60770 - Pulkit07:issue60764, r=Centril

add impl_trait_in_bindings to INCOMPLETE_FEATURES

impl_trait_in_bindings is not yet complete and can lead to compiler crashes.

Fixes #60764.
